TEXT: Please call Stella.  Ask her to bring these things with her from the store:  Six spoons of fresh snow peas, five thick slabs of blue cheese, and maybe a snack for her brother Bob.  We also need a small plastic snake and a big toy frog for the kids.  She can scoop these things into three red bags, and we will go meet her Wednesday at the train station.

TRANSCRIPTION: ə p l iː s k ɔ l s t ɛ l ɐ æ s k æ t ə b ɹ ɪ ŋ ð ɪ z θ ɪ ŋ z w ɪ tʃ ɑːɹ f ɹ ʌ m ð ə s t ɑː s ɪ k s p uː n s ʌ v f ɹ ɛ ʃ s n oʊ p iː z f aɪ v ɪ k s l æ p s ʌ v b l uː tʃ iː z æ n m eɪ b iː ɐ s n æ k f ɔːɹ h ɑːɹ b ɹ ɔ d ɚ b ɔ b w uː ɔː l s oʊ n iː d ɐ s m ɔː p l s t ɪ k s n ɪ k æ n d ɐ b ɪ ɡ t oʊ f ɹ ɔ ɡ f ɔːɹ ð ə k eɪ t s ʃ iː k æ n s k uː p ð iː z θ ɪ ŋ z ɪ n t ʊ θ ɹ i ɹ ɛ d b æ ɡ z æ n d w iː w ɪ l ɡ oʊ m ɪ t ɑː w ɛ n z t eɪ æ d ɪ t ɪ ŋ s t eɪ ʃ ə n

SNAKE INCONTEXT: sn-ɪk
SNAKE NOCONTEXT: smɪk
SNACK INCONTEXT: snæk
SNACK NOCONTEXT: smak
BAGS INCONTEXT: bæɡz
BAGS NOCONTEXT: ɑ
